instance_template: node(1..4). edge(1,2,10). edge(1,3,5). edge(2,4,5). edge(3,4,10). start(1). terminal(4).

hard_constraints.description: Imagine you are directing traffic: for every node that is not where the flow starts or ends, the total amount of flow arriving must exactly equal the total amount of flow leaving, so that no flow is lost or created out of thin air.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- node(V), not start(V), not terminal(V), In = #sum{ F,U : flow(U,V,F) }, Out = #sum{ F,W : flow(V,W,F) }, In != Out.

soft_constraints.description: Our main goal is to push as much flow as possible to the terminal node; to achieve this, we create a penalty equal to the negative of the total terminal inflow, encouraging the solver to find the largest possible value.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("MaximizeTerminalFlow", T, -I) :- terminal(T), I = #sum{ F,U : flow(U,T,F) }.
